p: In Figure 11, after the separation process, the bands in 2927 and 2850 cm−1 presented relative intensity reduction when compared with the bands in 1716 and 1601 cm−1, which indicates the separation of glycerol and catalyst (not totally) [39]. The material was acidified with HCl solution (0.1 mol.L−1), washed until neutral pH, dried, and reutilized in the optimal condition of the biodiesel synthesis reaction (Experiment 27—Table 11). Table 12 presents the obtained conversions to alkyl esters when the P24 was reutilized.
